item.title: Learning Optimal Lattice Vector Quantizers for End-to-end Neural Image Compression
item.description: Learned optimal lattice vector quantization (OLVQ) drastically boosts neural image compression efficiency by adapting quantizer structures to latent feature distributions, achieving significant rate-d…
